    • Method Detail

      • getInsertLocation

        public Material.PluginInsertLocation getInsertLocation()
        Description copied from interface: IMaterialPlugin
        Where to insert the plugin. The Material class needs to know at what location the shader fragments should be inserted when assembling the shaders. The locations are defined in the Material.PluginInsertLocation enum.
        Specified by:
        getInsertLocation in interface IMaterialPlugin
        Returns:

      • getVertexShaderFragment

        public IShaderFragment getVertexShaderFragment()
        Description copied from interface: IMaterialPlugin
        Returns the vertex shader fragment. This should only be used by the Material class.
